house_listing.house_description: This condominium built in 1981 has 2 bedroom(s), 2 bath(s) , 2 car attached garage and approximately 1538 square feet of living area. Rooms include dining room. Features include private pool, air conditioning.
house_listing.firm_name: Joan Cohen Realty Lic. Real Estate Broker
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Elevator, Roman Tub, Tennis Court(s), Walk-In Closet(s)
